棻字的基本解释

棻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fēn］
［《廣韻》撫文切，平文，敷。］
［《廣韻》符分切，平文，奉。］
(1)香木。多用为人名。汉代有刘歆子棻。唐代有令狐德棻。
(2)通“紛”。茂盛貌。

棻字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　棻； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页535第06
【廣韻】符分切，音焚。【說文】作棻，香木也。　又【唐韻】府文切【集韻】【韻會】敷文切，?音芬。義同。【類篇】梤㯣?同。棻字原从㞣，作㞣下木。《說文》梤，香木也。

棻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
棻字的起名意思

：棻字原为一种香木，木之葳蕤，香之渺远，指有香味的木头。多用于人名。

Fen
Basic explanation of words
Fen
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fēn］
["Guangyun" cut the text, plain text, apply. ]
["Guangyun" Fu divided and cut, plain text, Feng. ]
(1) Fragrant wood. Use more as a person's name. There was Liu Xin Zifen in the Han Dynasty. There was Linghu Defen in the Tang Dynasty.
(2) Through "Fun". Lush appearance.
Fen
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　棻; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 535 06
【Guang Yun】Fu divided into pieces, sound burned. [Said the text] Zuo Fen, fragrant wood also.　 [Tang Yun] Fu Wenqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Fu Wenqie,? Yinfen. The same meaning. 【Classes】梤㯣? Same. The word "Feng" is originally from 㞣, made 㞣下木. "Said the text" 梤, also fragrant wood.

Name meaning
: The word "Feng" was originally a kind of fragrant wood. Mostly used for names.
